name: Boykomet
description:
This is a politically-inspired reskinning of Angry Birds with a Bulgarian politician that needs to be thrown away. The idea was inspired by the Bulgarian first lady at the time, that in October 2010 tweeted about prime minister Boyko Borissov:

"What we need is not a Boykometer, we need a Boykomet [meaning Boyko-thrower]. To send him far far away, and let those poor people work out how to handle him". In 2021, more than a decade later, Borissov, a communist protege and alleged criminal was still in power.

Some of the game assets are still the original by Rovio Entertainment Ltd. The rest are original or reworks of the public domain. All original contributions are likewise shared as public domain.
